to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: hi Kirk...
body:
Hello Tony:  You will need to give me more information than that.
What messages do you get when trying to download the images and so
forth?  We don't really recommend the floppy images anymore either.
Usually we recommend Shane's debian CD image.

  Kirk
